format: YAML/BitBake recipe includes (used in OpenEmbedded/Yocto projects)
description: This file is an include snippet for GCC test suite configuration within an OpenEmbedded build setup, facilitating cross-compilation and testing via QEMU or SSH.

methods.name: generate_qemu_linux_user_config
methods.description: Generates a configuration script for QEMU-based testing environment, setting up virtualization options and board info.

methods.name: generate_remote_ssh_linux_config
methods.description: Generates a configuration script for SSH-based testing setup, configuring remote host details and connection commands.
